ygData.subject: Re: "guild""servers"
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hehe, my guild dun have much planned schedules, I basically leave it to the timezone commanders (US/Canade & Asia Pacific) to oragnize activities. Even the
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Wilson" <ritzbits@...>
> >>I was in a guild but op-ed out cos I don't like planned schedules etc.
> Freedom for me, I'd say.
Hehe, my guild dun have much planned schedules, I basically leave it to the
timezone commanders (US/Canade & Asia Pacific) to oragnize activities.
Even the daily server war is just an unofficial events which there is no
hard and fast rule for members to attend. As for guild meeting, we hope as
many members can join as possible, but we expected much lesser coz members
come from all timezone, hard for them to login at certain time. That's the
main reason why we have timezone commanders, so that when the local
pioneers not online, other trust-worthy members can lead the guild ;)

> >>Hehehe, I lost my 2-storey and I was really sad cos I hardly play and
it
> took long to save up...not to mention what was in my chests etc! Now to
> EQ...
Ah I understand...if I lost my main houses, most probably I will quit too.
It's a 2-S & small smithy blocked by mountain, build more than a yr ago.
I got my own mining space which no one else can enter. Even bug users
can't break in as they cannot even reach my door steps. In house got 20
over bags of GM assasin poisoned GM smith weapons/bows, more than 15 bags
of magical stuffs (1/3 is silver), 10 over vanq weap, 20 over bags of GM
alchemist potions (2/3 are GH and GE), >5k reg each, tons of house add-on
deeds etc etc. Even though I got 3 over million worth of GPs in bank (coz
of house deeds), if I kena looted, also very sian to restart everything and
go around buying/making the stuffs again...

> Basic Inventory is 8 spaces/slots. To widen it, you will have to put a
bag
> in a slot to make it have more space since a bag itself has 4-8slots. So
max
> is 8x8 = 64 slots. To transfer items amg chars, it like UO, drop is in a
> secluded place then pick it up before it vanishes. Or just do Friend to
> Yourself.
Ah, so no house to store stuffs. Can misc items (like potions) be stacked?
I presumed it will then required 1-2 mules to act like storage house? ;)
Or there are much lesser stuffs in EQ that i dun need much storage space?

> >>Why the MSG Board since we already have this list? Pardon me...
Msg board allowed everyone to read and leave their msg, and it can store
much more stuffs unlike email which once u deleted, it's gone fast. Also,
sometime several pple replies to one query and the msg roll big very fast.
For eg, if I start a topic asking which server to start off, many players
will reply to this list and the topics may end up several emails. But in
msg board, it's more organised. We used to think of starting a mailing
list for guild, but end up with 2 msg boards coz members find it easier to
communicate. Anyway it's just a supplement to this mailing list, not a
replacement ;)

DF
